bookSourceGroup: 🍿 日常,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '完结漫画',
    '连载漫画'
];
orderby = [
    'wanjie',
    'lianzai'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby[i]}/index_{{page-1}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
exploreUrl.push(explore('最新上架', `{{Get('url')}}/new_coc.html`, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Order = `{{get('order',Get('p'))}}`;
kind = [
'热血机战','科幻未来','恐怖惊悚','推理悬疑','滑稽搞笑','恋爱生活','纯爱人生','体育竞技','纯情少女','魔法奇幻','武侠经典'
];
tag = [
'rexue','kehuan','kongbu','xuanyi','gaoxiao','love','danmei','tiyu','chunqing','qihuan','wuxia'
];
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${tag[j]}/index${Order}_{{page-1}}.html`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(50, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/127.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/127.0.0.0",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   繁简转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "  ①新新①  ", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: "   ②新新②   ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: "  ③新新③  ", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换排序  ɞ´«ˇ༻                    ", type: "button" },
  { name: "           最近更新           ", type: "button", action: "p(0)" },
  { name: "           最新上架           ", type: "button", action: "p(1)" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    if (/wanjie|lianzai|new_coc/.test(baseUrl)) {
        var list = java.getElements('.ar_list_co ul li');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].text();
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': '',
                'kind': '',
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': '',
                'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('src') + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/"}}',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('span a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        if (!baseUrl.includes("index")) {
            Data();
        } else {
            var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/index_(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'index_' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
            var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
            if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.ar_list_co ul li')[0]) {
                Data();
            }
        }
    } else {
        var list = java.getElements('.ar_list_co dl');
        for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
            name = list[i].select('h1').text();
            author = list[i].select('.author').text();
            kind = String(list[i].select('.status').text()).replace(/状态|[中已\s]/g, '') + ',' + String(list[i].select('.time').text()).replace(/时间/, '');
            intro = list[i].select('.info').text();
            data.push({
                'name': name,
                'author': author,
                'kind': kind,
                'word': '',
                'latest': '',
                'intro': intro,
                'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('src') + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/"}}',
                'url': Get('url') + list[i].select('h1 a').attr('href')
            });
        }
        var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/(\d+).html/, function(match, p1) {return (parseInt(p1) + 1) + '.html';}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
        var next_1 = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(next);
        if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('.ar_list_co dl')[0]) {
            Data();
        }
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
User = Checkwait(User);
if (User == true) {
    var list = java.getElements('ul dl');
    for (i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
        name = list[i].select('h1').text();
        author = list[i].select('.author a')[1].text();
        kind = String(list[i].select('.author a')[0].text()).replace(/[中已]/g, '') + ',' + String(list[i].select('.font_colorA').text()).replace(/[;；]/g, ',');
        intro = list[i].select('.info').text();
        data.push({
            'name': name,
            'author': author,
            'kind': kind,
            'word': '',
            'latest': '',
            'intro': intro,
            'cover': list[i].select('img').attr('src') + ',{"headers":{"Referer":"' + Get('url') + '/"}}',
            'url': list[i].select('dt a').attr('href')
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/p=(\d+)/, function(match, p1) {return 'p=' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));

    var searchkey = java.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"));
    if (!list[0] || !next_1.select('ul dl')[0] || /书源|使用|说明|書源|說明/.test(searchkey)) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = java.getElements('.ar_list_col li');
    date = String(java.getElements('.ar_list_coc li:contains(更新)').text()).replace(/更新/g, '');
    for (i = list.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        title = list[i].select('a')[0].text();
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/\s共.*?图/, '').replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == 0 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + list[i].select('a')[0].attr('href')
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    java.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "searchkey"), e);
    return Get('url').replace(/www/, 'so') + '/k.php?k=' + e + '&p={{page}}';
}(key));
</js>
